name: Black Diamond Distance Carbon FLZ Poles - Unisex
description: Superlight, super-quick to deploy and adjustable to activities and terrain. These poles have a place in the hearts and packs of dayhikers, alpine climbers, backpackers and trail runners who navigate steep or variable terrain.Carbon construction keeps the weight way down.Lightweight EVA grips with mini-extensions that let you choke up the shafts on steep terrain.3 sections fold Z-style for easy carrying. Speed cones make reassembly fast and easy.FlickLock Pro system allows fast, secure length adjustment.Interchangeable, non-scarring rubber Tech Tips and carbide Tech Tips.Stopper baskets with shaft catchers let you secure folded sections.
